Subramanya C R wrote:

> Hi members,
>
> I came across problem running Heritrix on Windows XP, it was throwing
> exception in terminal "java.io.IOException: Cannot find subdir: conf".
>
> I just add the command line option like below :
> "-Dheritrix.home=<heritrix_home_path>"
>
> It worked, I am not sure is there any other method to overcome this
> problem. However my friends anyone having problem running Heritrix on
> Windows can get help from this.
>
> Sample .bat or .cmd file
> ----------------------
> set HERITRIX_HOME=C:/java/heritrix-1.4.0
> set
> CLASSPATH=%HERITRIX_HOME%/heritrix-1.4.0.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%/lib/ant....
> java -Dheritrix.home=C:/java/heritrix-1.4.0 -Xmx256m
> org.archive.crawler.Heritrix
> -----------------------------
>
> Thanks,
> Subramanya C R
>
>
>
